column4: You know, I really do not want to give up on ubuntu... but I can not seem to get my Linksys WPC54G mini pci Wireless card to work on my laptop.  Can anyone here help me out.  I read the forums and have put in a lot of effort to do it myself.
Ill take another look but ndiswrapper did not seem to work
the bot gave you a step above that - all wifi docs
